full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MGON PO CHOS RGYAL LHA MO ZHAL BZHI RNAM SRAS BEG TZE THANG LHA SHAM PO BSTAN BCU GNYIS SPRUL PA'I CHOS RGYAL RANG RA BKA' SDOD GTOR BSNGO RGYUN KHYER DU ZA HOR BANDES SBYAR BA'I ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES SOGS KYIS RTEN MED PA RNAMS GSHEGS SU GSOL, ,'BANG DANG RTZOL BA MA DGOS PAR SOGS KYI SHIS PA BRJOD, ,GTOR BSDOS NYUNG NGU BYAS PA 'DI NI BLO BZANG MTHU STOBS KYI RGYUN KHYER DU ZA HOR GYI BANDES SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DKAR BRAG PA NGAG DBANG BYAMS PA'O,, ,,)
